Description_lang: Your Consecration is $s1% larger, and enemies within it have $s2% reduced movement speed.$?c3[Your Divine Hammer is $s4% larger, and enemies within them have ${$198137s3*-1}% reduced movement speed.][]

description_blz.en_US: Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.
description_blz.es_MX: Tu Consagración es un 15% más grande, y los enemigos de su interior pierden un 50% de velocidad de movimiento.
description_blz.pt_BR: Sua Consagração fica 15% maior, e os inimigos dentro dela têm a velocidade de movimento reduzida em 50%.
description_blz.de_DE: Vergrößert den Effektbereich Eurer 'Weihe' um 15% und verringert die Bewegungsgeschwindigkeit von Gegnern im Effektbereich um 50%.
description_blz.en_GB: Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.
description_blz.es_ES: Tu Consagración es un 15% más grande y los enemigos en su interior sufren un 50% de reducción de velocidad de movimiento.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente la zone d’effet de votre Consécration de 15%. Les adversaires qui se trouvent à l’intérieur voient leur vitesse de déplacement réduite de 50%.
description_blz.it_IT: La tua Consacrazione è il 15% più ampia e i nemici al suo interno subiscono il 50% di riduzione alla velocità di movimento.
description_blz.ru_RU: Область действия "Освящения" увеличивается на 15%, а скорость передвижения противников в этой области снижается на 50%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 자신의 신성화 지역이 15% 더 넓어지고, 신성화 지역 안에 있는 적의 이동 속도가 50%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 你的奉獻效果範圍提高15%，且範圍內的敵人移動速度降低50%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 你的奉献的影响范围扩大15%，且会使范围内的敌人移动速度降低50%。
